experience.title: Account Manager
experience.description: Account Manager- Commercial and Captive Accounts, Hyderabad, India:1. Primarily responsible for revenue generation in Indian market from IT sales2. Partake in business development activities, including proposal drafting, facilitation and participation at both internal and external presentations with key sales teams and alliance partners3. Negotiate and bring to conclusion business deals swiftly for greater throughput4. Develop long-term sustainable business relationships with key stakeholders within the customer portfolio in order to establish integrated planning partnership5. Responsible for handling relationship and Account Management for large enterprise accounts like Broadridge, CA Technologies and ADP6. Responsible for revenue generation in non-govt & non-BFSI market for Professional Services Sales
